channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI’s data scraping wins big as Raw Story’s copyright lawsuit dismissed by NY court
item.description: The dismissal of Raw Story’s lawsuit is more than a win for OpenAI—it’s an indicator of how courts may handle similar copyright claims.

item.title: After Trump victory, ‘DJT’ shares resume rally while Phunware slides
item.description: In a post on Truth Media, Donald Trump said he has no intention of selling his shares in the social-media platform.

item.title: ‘Unrestricted’ AI group Nous Research launches first chatbot
item.description: Nous Chat gives users access to its large language model (LLM) Hermes 3-70B, a fine-tuned variant of Meta's Llama 3.1.

item.title: I’m 67, married and have two mortgages worth $660,000. Should I use my 401(k) to pay them off?
item.description: “I want to have $6,000 a month in cash to live comfortably and travel upon retirement.”
